summary: A comprehensive unit‑test suite that validates the behavior of the Wav2Vec2 CTC tokenizer, covering token addition, string conversion, offset handling, special‑character support, nested vocabularies, pretrained model listings, and end‑to‑end encoding/decoding with both TensorFlow and PyTorch models.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the speech‑recognition tokenizer so that downstream applications can rely on accurate token mapping, decoding, and model compatibility, reducing regression risk and supporting continuous integration.
